name: Mind your own COLOR!
description:
Can you sync your mind and eyes with your finger?
Do you believe what you read or what you see?
This time you have to BELIEVE IN WHAT YOU READ!!

Check out the new Color Switch the most addictive FREE to Play Game: MIND YOUR OWN COLOR!!
Play among your friends and prove them you are the best!!

Simple and tricky - 4 words and 4 colours but ONLY ONE MATCH!
Endless game, the most difficult simple color switch game you have ever played!
Be the best and make the highest score in MIND YOUR OWN COLOR!!!
